content: Warning signs can be thoughts, feelings, or behaviors that appear or increase when you get distressed (for example, abusing substances or feeling hopeless).
Why is it a good idea to identify my warning signs?
It is important to identify signs that you are heading towards a crisis, so that you can use your safety plan to help manage the situation and prevent things from getting worse.
Here are some examples of what other people have written:

I am thinking about suicide.
I am feeling overwhelmed about finances.
I am worrying that my partner will leave me and feeling like a burden on my family.
Tip: You can change the order of your list by pressing and holding an item in the list and dragging it up or down.
